response.original_title: The Break-up Bet With My Billionaire Ex
response.overview: When Layla and Joshua break up, they sign a separation agreement: If they're both still single in five years, they get married. Five years later, after becoming the world's hottest and wealthiest chef, Joshua takes the position of head chef at the restuarant where Layla works. Joshua wants her to fulfill the contract, but with her health in an unstable condition, Layla lies and says she's already engaged. Still, an undeniable chemistry builds between them, and the flames of love become hard to suppress. Will Joshua ultimately discover Layla's lie? Can they bridge the gap of lost time and truly be together again, love conquering all?
response.title: The Break-up Bet With My Billionaire Ex
